title: AI does not pay replicate cost
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on August 19, 2012 13:59:20_

comment by BeHolder1 on revision revision r31e184eecd0f391d89922a32731ca6f3eeb83943 :

Replicate ability (AI doesn't pay the cost):
Gigadrowse, Leap of Flame, Pyromatics, Shattering Spree, Thunderheads, Train of Thought, Vacuumelt.
